name: Quark (ARC-20)
description: QUARK (QUARK) is one of the first ARC20 meme coins, designed to bring a touch of humor and creativity to the Bitcoin network. The tokenâ€™s name is inspired by the basic units that form matter in physics, "quarks". Interestingly, each QUARK token exists as a smallest unit of Bitcoin, "sat." This link between a fundamental scientific concept and blockchain adds an intriguing layer to its identity.
